name: 1988 NBA SLAM DUNK CONTEST - MICHAEL JORDAN
description:
The NBA Slam Dunk Contest (officially known as the AT&T Slam Dunk Contest for sponsorship reasons) 
is an annual National Basketball Association (NBA) competition held during the NBA All-Star Weekend. 

The contest was inaugurated by the American Basketball Association (ABA) at its All-Star Game in 1976 in Denver, the same year the slam dunk was legalized in the National Collegiate Athletic Association.
 
_

While Robinson is the only NBA player to win the competition three times, there are five men who have been victorious twice: Dominique Wilkins (1985 and 1990), Michael Jordan (1987 and 1988), Harold Miner (1993 and 1995), Jason Richardson (2002 and 2003) and Zack LaVine (2015 and 2016)

-
